channel.title: Getting 99 Magic :)
channel.description:
Very close to 99 mage :)
28 experience until 99 mage getting it at 9:00 p.m. my time (It's 8:39 right now so 21 minutes..) getting 99 if anyone wants to come they can come watch not planning on having a big party. World 62 at Yanille.
Just got it I couldn't wait and I have been on for 12 + hours today:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/rgxeh5.png[/img]

item.title: Getting 99 Magic :)
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:3, topic:454754”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=557615.msg4079852#msg4079852 date=1345254409]

Very close to 99 mage

28 experience until 99 mage getting it at 9:00 p.m. my time (It’s 8:39 right now so 21 minutes…) getting 99 if anyone wants to come they can come watch not planning on having a big party. World 62 at Yanille.

I’m ftp
[/quote]Sucks that yanille is p2p lol and that’s where you get the cape.[/quote]
I know, my older brother got 99 magic a couple years ago I watched him get the cape irl

Edit: gratz
